document.full_text: gold rallied above $1,500 an ounce for the first time on wednesday, extending this week's record run as investors hedged growing inflation risks and bought into a broad commodities rally as the dollar slumped.
document.title: gold powers above $1,500 as inflation worries mount
lines_and_colors: gold rallied above $1,500 an ounce for the first time on wednesday, extending this week's record run as investors hedged growing inflation risks and bought into a broad commodities rally as the dollar slumped.
